title: Can solid compounds conduct electricity? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well yes they can. Here’s some fun https://www.google.ca/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwjC3tmgnpXSAhVDxmMKHZ6zCpUQtwIIHDAA&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DBuG1oNRQnyI&usg=AFQjCNFCag7VACT7IkXXVVmNy-O4N66mhQ&sig2=xmnZHtsdnTIqngMGE09Tsw As well graphene enhanced compounds are very conductive. Rebar graphene for lithium ion capacitors I personally am making these varieties of compounds my self..graphene ,Hemp,Chitosan and common household materials. Y’all can follow my ramblings on Face Book Stock | Facebook
